summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements: REQ-1 (formatDateTime utility), REQ-2 (partial - several pages updated but NoteCard.tsx and NoteModal.tsx are missing), REQ-3 (gold presets in SettingsPage), REQ-4 (luminance-based text color via --accent-text), REQ-5 (three CSS variables in appStore), and REQ-6 (accent applied to nav, buttons, streak ring, routines). However, NoteCard.tsx and NoteModal.tsx are not present in the diff, meaning note timestamps are not updated. StreakWidget.tsx is also absent. The index.css files are not shown as updated with the new CSS variables declared at :root. Habit log entry timestamps and todo due/created dates are not explicitly shown as updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace date-only displays in NoteCard.tsx and NoteModal.tsx with formatDateTime calls for created, updated, and reminder timestamps
missing_requirements.reason: Neither NoteCard.tsx nor NoteModal.tsx appear in the diff (added or modified). Note timestamps are not updated per REQ-2.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace date-only displays in StreakWidget.tsx with formatDateTime calls for streak last check-in timestamp
missing_requirements.reason: StreakWidget.tsx is not present in the diff. REQ-2 explicitly requires updating StreakWidget.tsx for streak last check-in timestamp.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace date-only displays for todo due/created dates and habit log entries with formatDateTime
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows todo due/created dates or habit log entry timestamps being updated to use formatDateTime in any page component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/src/index.css and frontend/index.css to declare --accent, --accent-2, and --accent-soft CSS variables on :root
missing_requirements.reason: Neither index.css file appears in the modified files list as being updated with the new CSS variable declarations. The frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions index.css but only for an unrelated border fix.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a subtle box-shadow or border to bright accent buttons to maintain definition on light backgrounds
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows luminance-based text color computation and --accent-text variable, but no explicit box-shadow or border styling is added to accent-colored buttons for bright gold colors in light mode.

hallucinated_features.description: AppHeader component with app title, page title display, and settings shortcut button
hallucinated_features.reason: A new AppHeader.tsx component was added with a sticky header showing page titles and a settings shortcut. This was not requested in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional non-gold accent color presets (Emerald, Sky Blue, Rose, Violet, Slate) in SettingsPage
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states non-goals include adding new color themes beyond the gold/yellow accent presets requested. The diff includes OTHER_PRESETS with 5 non-gold colors.

hallucinated_features.description: --accent-text CSS variable computed dynamically from luminance for automatic text color selection
hallucinated_features.reason: While REQ-4 requires dark text on bright accents, computing --accent-text as a dynamic CSS variable via luminance calculation was not specified. The requirement mentions using dark text for specific bright colors, not a fully dynamic luminance-based variable system.
